abstrac: I always believe in commitment, dedication and honesty towards my job, and I will submit the assigned job within the time limit.
bio:
Hi,
I am from India, and really want to do some job from home to earn, for this I have good laptop with desk top, good internet speed, so that never fail to submission of work on or before time.
To get good job I can do some sample work also, and I can give 7-10 Hours per day.
I don't mind to work on Weekends and can give 6-7 hours.
I have done certificate course on Adobe photo shop. If I get job then this will be a first job through Guru.com, and I will be always thankful to Guru.com

Regards,
Suparna Dasgupta

7-10 hours on weekdays and 6-7 hours on Sundays.
I like to get 30% advance in my account.

services.title: Graphic Design
description: My focus on graphic designer has led me to become fully experienced with various design styles & software, mainly the adobe software series. I do handle logo, web & game design essentially via Photos…

bio:
Thank you for taking a look at my profile ! During the last 7 years , I've been doing web development & design all along with mobile development.

-Being a web developer I'm fully experienced with front-end including : HTML5, CSS3 , JavaScript, JQeury and Bootstrap. I also do designs and mockups via photoshop and you can refer to my Behance portfolio to see previous work of mine.
-As for my mobile development skills it includes both working with Unity and Corona SDK. I currently take work related to Android only and I currently work on my own game on the google play store.

I have a good English level , written and spoken and I'm flexible when it comes to communication. Outside the work , I've been a part of multiple clubs and communities, so I learnt how to share and listen to others.
I'm looking forward to a nice work experience and I'm willing to do my best to deliver quality results.

commnet: Rene did a great job combining both language knowledge and technical knowledge of the target area.
